Author: Snovio_ICO
Title: Snovio Announces New Platform - Snovian.space
Body: Dear, Snovians!  Our latest project Snovian.Space keeps growing and stirring international interest among crypto enthusiasts and tech professionals all over the world.  Which is why we decided to split our Facebook presence into 2 pages: one for Snov.io service users, the other - for members of the crypto community, that is holders of SNOV tokens and Snovian.Space users.  This will help you decide for yourself which news are most relevant to you, as well as help us bring you the most fitting stories and announcements.  On Snov.io page you can find all the latest product development updates, top hacks and helpful guides from our blog, Snovio office life outtakes and much more.  üëâüèª https://www.facebook.com/snovioplatform/  On Snovian.Space page you'll find all updates on our reward-based social platform, including news about new features, as well as announcements about SNOV exchange listings, collaborations, conferences, contests and lots of other surprises.  üëâüèª https://www.facebook.com/ICOsnovio/  Discover new ways to grow your skills with us!

Author: Snovio_ICO
Title: Snovio Announces New Platform - Snovian.space
Body: 3 Ways to Use Snov.io‚Ä¶ for Making Money.  Let us share one of the latest articles in our blog  Do you remember the good old money making times back in the day? When you could use lots of tools and software to literally make money? Oh we definitely do, as true marketing dinosaurs, we have been into marketing software for more than a decade.  Not all software and tools for money making were smooth and white-hat, but they definitely gave users freedom ‚Äì freedom of how to use the tool. There were so many opportunities!  While creating Snov.io we put a lot of hard work and passion into making it a real all-in-one platform, something that has many useful features. Something that will give our users forgotten freedoms!  Snov.io is a great lead generation and outreach tool for both B2B companies and one-man-army sales and marketing specialists, but in addition to that it can be used in so many other ways.  This time we are happy to provide you with a quick compilation of methods on how to use Snov.io for money making. How awesome is that?  Your imagination is the limit, and we hope the 3 ways described here will help you benefit from using Snov.io even more. Enjoy!  Continue reading...

Author: Snovio_ICO
Title: Snovio Announces New Platform - Snovian.space
Body: This is what you all have been waiting for!   Today we are proud to announce the launch of phase 1.0 of https://snovian.space/  All of us at Snov.io have been working hard to perfect the platform, and we are pleased with what it came to be. You can now register and be one of the first people to explore the decentralized social networking platform that is Snovian.Space.  Phase one allows registrations and profile confirmation which helps build a user base. Next, we will enter Phase 2 adding metamask integration, messaging and airdrops - think of a major social network where you can easily find your audience and pitch your message simply by rewarding your listeners with crypto. No hidden payments to the platform and no paid plans!  We will soon start reaching out to all the people registered for the airdrop - the first snovians who participated in the early bird program. The support of these 50k people reminded us what we were capable of and helped us along the way.  Soon we will be holding an AMA webinar to answer all of your questions regarding the platform. Make sure to check out the roadmap for Snovian.Space on the website later today, if you‚Äôd like to stay up-to-date on our progress.  And Snovian Space is going to Hong Kong with its booth. By that time we should be ready with the main functionality.  Thank you, Snov.io Team üåè

Author: Snovio_ICO
Title: Snovio Announces New Platform - Snovian.space
Body: Snovian.Space is happy to anounce a collaboration with Musards ‚Äî a platform where you get paid when you listen to your favourite artists.  The core idea of both networks are really close so this partnership is really natural for our businesses. While Musards supports independent artists and gives 100% Revenue to Artists, Snovian.Space let Snovians get 100% reward when they are being contacted by other professionals,  sole entrepreneurs and businesses.  Snovian.Space is the platform where artists can find a new band member or pitch to music event organisers. We are looking to spread the word about Musards among Snovians!   Read more: https://medium.com/@antarjyot/musards-partners-with-snovian-space-sponsors-first-live-concert-97073ddacefe

Author: Snovio_ICO
Title: Snovio Announces New Platform - Snovian.space
Body: We are excited to announce a massive new Snovian.Space Bounty Program. Only quality accounts will be admitted, so there‚Äôs a lot up for grabs.  The whole idea of this program is to reward real people for spreading the word about Snovian.Space by posting comments on FB, reposting photos on Instagram, tweeting and posting genuine videos. Participate and start earning SNOV!  Take part in the Snovian.Space bounty programs and help it grow.  Youtube: $5000 bounty  Bounty Payouts:  10k+ subscribers ‚Äì $400/video  2-10k subscribers ‚Äì $300/video  500-2k subscribers ‚Äì $100/video  50-500 subscribers ‚Äì $50/video  How to participate:  - Submit your Youtube account link here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSe4TE4X4P4T0dPHMGBniaXNBNgZvxtylsiPBMcLn0C5EO6o8Q/viewform - Subscribe to Snovio Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/snovio - Your Youtube video must be at least 2 minutes long. For this project we encourage you to share your genuine opinions and to start intriguing discussions. - You must have at least 50 organic subscribers to be eligible for this campaign. - You must have links to our Snovian.Space website in your video.  Bounty Rules:  1. Any misleading or dishonest assertions and/or false claims are not allowed, and stakes for such videos will not be awarded. 2. Campaign is available until $3,000 pool runs out. Pool may be increased at any time at our own discretion. 3. Sign up and validate your account at Snovian.space: https://snovian.space/ in our to receive your reward.  Facebook: $3000 bounty  Bounty Payouts:   Facebook share with your comment (latest news about snovian.space from snovian‚Äôs FB, Twitter or FB):  1k+ friends ‚Äì $7.00/share  200-1k friends ‚Äì $3.00/share  100-200 friends ‚Äì $2.00/share  50-100 friends ‚Äì $1.00/share  30-50 friends ‚Äì $0.50/share  Facebook own genuine post (latest news about snovian.space from snovian‚Äôs FB, Twitter or FB):  1k+ friends ‚Äì $10.00/share  200-1k friends ‚Äì $5.00/share  100-200 friends ‚Äì $4.00/share  50-100 friends ‚Äì $3.00/share  30-50 friends ‚Äì $1.00/share  How to participate:  - Submit your facebook account link here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdqf1msCExlbP3UiSdl1LFpzpnVA1vG0IrEcJ5zeZM9ag3nGQ/viewform - Follow Snovio on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ICOsnovio/ - Share Snovio‚Äôs posts and add your comments. Adding a comment to a post is a must, comments should be at least 40 words long. - Or create your own post with latest news about snovian.space. - Submit your shares (https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSemO4UhWdHg5E1qA0vpcaB2PDgz-g6E-7AUIUh25B8smKuN4g/viewform) and earn up to $3.00 per share.  Bounty Rules:  1. Participants must stay following until the end of the campaign. 2. Only one Facebook account per person is allowed. 3. Your account must be at least 5 months old. 4. You must have at least 30 friends to be eligible. 5. Share limit is 3 shares/week. 6. Campaign is available until $3,000 pool runs out. Pool may be increased at any time at our own discretion. 7. Sign up and validate your account at Snovian.space: https://snovian.space/ in our to receive your reward.  Twitter : $3000 bounty  Bounty Payouts:  5k+ followers ‚Äì $3.00/retweet  1k+ followers ‚Äì $2.00/retweet  200-1k followers ‚Äì $1.00/retweet  How to participate:  - Submit your twitter account link here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScxeiHIbpWXqWH8vtepBOGhTL55_qBJDPBkh3UfdwXI9w3jPQ/viewform - Make sure you‚Äôre following Snovio‚Äôs account (https://twitter.com/snovio_ico) on Twitter. - Retweet tweets from @snovio_ico - Submit your retweets (https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeOkNNx494Bnk2EkdGkEGxnFhRimydc1hXybkHKdr0NiWgoyg/viewform) and earn up to $3.00 per retweet  Bounty Rules:  1. Participants must stay following until the end of the campaign. 2. Only one Twitter account per person is allowed. 3. Twitter account must be at least 1 month old. 4. You must have at least 200 followers to be eligible. 5. Retweet limit is 3 retweets/week. 6. Campaign is available until $3,000 pool runs out. Pool may be increased at any time at our own discretion. 7. Sign up and validate your account at Snovian.space: https://snovian.space/ in our to receive your reward.  INSTAGRAM : $3000 bounty  Bounty Payouts:  5k+ followers ‚Äì $20.00/repost  3k+ followers ‚Äì $8.00/repost  1k+ followers ‚Äì $6.00/repost  200-1k followers ‚Äì $3.00/repost  How to participate:  - Submit your Instagram account here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScgprqxASkBHfduvBsaW9vtd6anX92oaVfc9IUz8bCgOefgmw/viewform - Follow Snovio on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/snov.io/ - Repost Snovio‚Äôs posts, mention our page @snov.io and add hashtags #snov #snovian_space #earn_crypto in caption. - Add comment to repost - Mention, hashtag and comment to a post is a must, comments should be around 200 characters long.   - Submit your reposts (https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfff2GoXbQ3-0nZUlLYwmAAWR_E2htGsquwiI_m5vN4jLB53w/viewform) and earn up to $3.00 per regrann  Bounty Rules:  1. Participants must stay following until the end of the campaign. 2. One Instagram account per person is allowed. 3. Your account must be at least 5 months old. 4. You must have at least 200 followers to be eligible. 5. Repost limit is 3 reposts/week. 6. Campaign is available until $3,000 pool runs out. Pool may be increased at any time at our own discretion. 7. Sign up and validate your account at Snovian.space: https://snovian.space/ in our to receive your reward.  Earn FAQs  How will I receive my earnings?  Any rewards that you earn will be tracked and totaled in a Google Sheet which you can access later. Campaigns that involve verification by Snovio team may require up to 7 days to be verified. Your earnings will be displayed in dollars and paid in SNOV tokens, based on the price of SNOV at the close of the public sale.  What is a SNOV token?  SNOV token is Snovio‚Äôs own cryptocurrency. SNOV is an ERC-20 token. That means that SNOV was created on the Ethereum blockchain and can be stored in an Ethereum wallet the same as any other ERC-20 token.   How can I use SNOV tokens?  SNOV tokens are used on Snovio platforms for an internal accounting between customers, the platform, and contributors. SNOV can also be traded at some major exchanges like IDEX, KuCoin, BiBox, EtherDelta and TIDEX.  When can I claim my tokens?  SNOV tokens that are earned through Snovio Earn program will be paid during the token distribution, which will take place in 30-45 days after the campaign launching, but not later than July 30.  Why I was delisted?  We reserve a right to remove anyone anytime we suspect to be a bot. Decisions made are final.   Take part in our Snovian.Space bounty program and start earning SNOV. Let's go!  Stay tuned: Snovian.Space: https://snovian.space/ Telegram Group: https://t.me/snovio_ico Telegram News Channel: https://t.me/snovio Twitter: https://twitter.com/snovio_ico Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ICOsnovio/ Reddit: www.reddit.com/r/snovio_ico Medium: https://medium.com/@ico_snovio Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/snov.io/ Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/snovio

Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/snovio  Twitter #snov #snovian_space #earn_crypto  @snovio_ico  Instagram @snov.io with the great team of passionate Snovians working on this project and the platforms ability to integrate and be easily adopted across multiple services makes it a clear winner in its own space and ahead of its time. #snov #snovian_space #earn_crypto  @snov.io With the great team of passionate Snovians working on this project and the platforms ability to integrate and be adopted across multiple services makes it a clear winner in its own space. #snov #snovian_space #earn_crypto  We at Snovio aim to build an all-in-one tool-set that helps marketing teams grow sales by scaling their lead generation efforts and reaching out to the right prospects, from job candidates to event organizers. With Snov.io you can: Find prospects across various sources like web domains or social networks; Find email addresses while browsing websites and send emails in a single chrome extension; Use various API methods https://snov.io/api.html; Verify emails instantly through a chrome extension or web app; Find web technologies along with contact details behind websites and apps, through our 'Web Technology Checker' extension. Simply connect your Gmail or SMTP account and start sending emails to your prospects list! On October 31st, 2017 Snovio successfully launched its capital raising Token Sale. There were 924 participants during the pre-sale and main sale. Snovio is a unique decentralized lead sourcing platform, combining SaaS and the Marketplace platform fuelled by SNOV tokens. This is the foundation for introducing an innovative approach to lead generation and sourcing. All transactions on the platform are conducted via smart contract and stored on the blockchain, making them immutable and transparent. Author: seaneym
Title: Snovio Announces New Platform - Snovian.space
Body: Hi Everyone,  Just wanting to share the new platform that we recently announced here at Snovio. Now as we are releasing the first ever decentralized lead generation platform by the end of this month, we have announced another exciting platform which we will be working on over the next 2 months.  Its called snovian.space  Now, as you all may know, LinkedIn's social media platform allows anyone to create a profile online, where they get a link to their profile, and a digital business card. Now here's the catch, if someone wants to see your profile and contact you, they must either a) send a friend request to connect with you or.. b) Sign up to LinkedIn's premium account, which cost's fiat to do so. Now the big problem here is that, Linkedin are making money off your own personal information, which we find to be a bit cheeky...  snovian.space helps solve this problem as, with the new platform, instead of people paying Snovio to contact another person online, the person who creates the profile gets paid! Yes you heard it here first! If you create a profile on snovian.space, and a business or anyone wants to contact you, they must offer you a Snovio token reward! We believe this to be an amazing idea as crypto is about the people, so we believe the people who supply there own personal information should be rewarded for it!  So that is it in a nutshell, below you can find a link to our video update of the new platform and how it works.  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sdr5T3TzTC0  Also please check out our 2 websites which tell you more about our 2 separate platforms..  snovian.space token.snov.io  Thanks for your time and hope to see use in our telegram chat group

Title: Snovio Announces New Platform - Snovian.space
Body: Sure. After signing up, a ‚Äònon-verified‚Äô account is created. It can be verified further. Account will be marked as  ‚Äònon-verified‚Äô unless verified.  Then user fulfills it with a personal information. After a user completes his profile, it must be reviewed by a moderator.
